XXvtrksopu:46_1: etad uktaṃ bhavati / anupalabdhirūpatā tāvat sarvāsām aviśiṣṭā /
XXvtrksopu:46_2: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /

XXvtrksopu:47_0: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
XXvtrksopu:47_2: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
XXvtrksopu:47_3: evam abhāvasādhanī sarvaivānupalabdhir vyāptisāmarthyād [Ts_293] dṛśyasyopalabdhiṃ viruṇaddhīti sāmarthyāt svabhāvānupalabdhir bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:47_4: na sākṣāt / yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:47_5: yat punar anyair ucyate / yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
XXvtrksopu:47_7: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
XXvtrksopu:48_0: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate /
XXvtrksopu:48_1: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:48_2: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:48_3: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
XXvtrksopu:48_4: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti /
XXvtrksopu:49_1: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
XXvtrksopu:49_3: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ [Ts_294] kṛtaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:49_4: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
XXvtrksopu:49_5: tatsattāmātrabhāvitvāt / anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
XXvtrksopu:49_6: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
XXvtrksopu:49_8: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
XXvtrksopu:49_9: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:50_2: sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād anayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:50_5: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
XXvtrksopu:50_8: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
XXvtrksopu:50_10: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca /
XXvtrksopu:50_13: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:50_17: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:50_19: tathā hi hetudharmasyaiva tādṛśo 'trānumitir yatrāmbhojabodhādaya ekakālā jātāḥ /

XXvtrksopu:50_31: idānim eva hi kathitam / svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:50_36: viruddhopalabdhyādau tu tattadviviktapradeśādikāryatvāt tādṛśasya [Ts_296] dahanādes tadutpattinibandhana eva iti /
XXvtrksopu:52_1: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
XXvtrksopu:53_1: tasya bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ / dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam /
XXvtrksopu:53_2: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
XXvtrksopu:53_5: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
XXvtrksopu:53_6: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:53_7: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:53_8: naiṣa doṣaḥ / sādharmyeṇāpi hi prayoge 'rthād vaidharmyagatiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:53_10: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam /
XXvtrksopu:53_11: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya buddhyāvasitasyābhāvāt /
XXvtrksopu:54_3: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:54_4: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
XXvtrksopu:54_5: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:55_0: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:55_1: yathā śaśaśirasi śṛṅgaṃ / nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
XXvtrksopu:55_2: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:56_1: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:56_4: yad utpattimat tad anityam / yathā ghaṭaḥ / utpattimac ca sukham ity avyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:56_5: utpattir hi svarūpalābhaḥ / sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
XXvtrksopu:56_6: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:56_7: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
XXvtrksopu:56_9: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:56_10: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ [Ts_298] pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:57_1: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
XXvtrksopu:57_2: dhūmas cātra / atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:57_3: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:57_6: yathā nīlaviśeṣaḥ / na caivam ihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya ghaṭasyopalabdhir iti /
XXvtrksopu:57_7: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:58_0: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline /
XXvtrksopu:58_1: saṃś ca śabdaḥ / asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
XXvtrksopu:58_2: utpattimac ca sukham / asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
XXvtrksopu:58_3: kṛtakaś ca śabda iti / atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:59_1: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
XXvtrksopu:59_2: dhūmaś cātreti / [Ts_299] atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:60_0: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:60_1: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
XXvtrksopu:60_2: arthād evārthagateḥ / artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
XXvtrksopu:60_3: nābhidhānaṃ viparyayāt / pāraṃparyeṇāpi na bhavati / sādhyasyaivābhidhānāt / sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:60_4: na / evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:60_5: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:60_7: tenāpi vinā sādhyapratīteḥ / tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam /
XXvtrksopu:60_11: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
XXvtrksopu:60_12: asad etat / tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:60_13: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:60_14: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
XXvtrksopu:61_5: apiśabdād dvayor api / sādhanasyābhāsaḥ sādhanasya sadṛśam ity arthaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:61_7: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_0: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_2: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
XXvtrksopu:62_4: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino 'siddham /
XXvtrksopu:62_5: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_6: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
XXvtrksopu:62_8: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ samūho 'gnisiddhyartham upādīyamāno 'siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_9: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
XXvtrksopu:62_10: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_11: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:62_12: sa eva deśas tadāpātadeśaḥ / tasya vibhrame / yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:62_14: nāpīdaṃ bauddhadarśanam / tathā hy uktam abhidharmakośe /
XXvtrksopu:64_0: āśrayāsiddhyāpy asiddhaḥ / yathā sarvagata ātmā sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād ākāśavat /
XXvtrksopu:64_2: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
XXvtrksopu:64_3: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante /
XXvtrksopu:64_4: ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:64_5: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
XXvtrksopu:64_6: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:64_7: yāvad ātmaiva na siddhaḥ // tad evam asiddhaḥ ṣaṭprakāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:65_1: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:65_6: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
XXvtrksopu:65_7: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:65_8: caśabdenaitat kathayati / na kevalaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi [Ts_302] prameyatvam anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:65_11: yo vā sapakṣavipakṣayor ekadeśavṛttiḥ sarvo 'sāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:65_12: tatra prayatnānantariyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvād ghaṭavad ity ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:65_13: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:65_20: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:66_1: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:66_2: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:67_1: kayor dvayoḥ / sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:67_3: anayoḥ [Ts_303] sapakṣe 'sattvam asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:67_5: / dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:67_7: ekasyāsiddhāv iti / asapakṣe 'sattvasya / aparasya saṃdeha iti sapakṣe sattvasya /
XXvtrksopu:67_8: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:67_10: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
XXvtrksopu:67_13: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
XXvtrksopu:68_0: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:68_4: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
XXvtrksopu:68_6: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:68_7: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa [Ts_304] uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:68_8: tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:68_9: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:68_10: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
XXvtrksopu:68_11: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:69_0: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
XXvtrksopu:69_1: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti /
XXvtrksopu:70_0: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
XXvtrksopu:70_1: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti
XXvtrksopu:71_0: atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:71_1: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
XXvtrksopu:71_3: asāmarthyaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ ca / asāmarthyaṃ tv asiddhaviruddhānaikantikabhedāt trividham /
XXvtrksopu:71_4: vaiyarthyaṃ tv ekam eveti / syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:71_5: tad uktam udyotakareṇāpi / adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
XXvtrksopu:72_1: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti
XXvtrksopu:73_0: tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
XXvtrksopu:73_1: [Ts_305] athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:73_2: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:73_3: vāstavaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ / kiṃ ca / yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:73_7: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:73_9: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate /
XXvtrksopu:74_0: 17. atra kecid āhuḥ / asiddha eva vaiyarthyaṃ antarbhavatīti /
XXvtrksopu:74_2: taddharmaś ca hetuḥ / tato 'pakṣadharmatvād vaiyarthyam asiddha evāntaryāti /
XXvtrksopu:74_3: anye tu sudhiya evam āhuḥ / nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:74_4: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
XXvtrksopu:74_6: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
XXvtrksopu:74_7: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
XXvtrksopu:74_8: sthitam etad [Ts_306] yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:75_0: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
XXvtrksopu:75_1: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:75_2: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
XXvtrksopu:75_4: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
XXvtrksopu:75_7: sādhānaṃ kṛteti samāsaḥ / tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:75_8: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:75_9: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
XXvtrksopu:75_11: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
XXvtrksopu:75_12: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:76_0: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:76_1: etāvanmātratvāt tasyeti / etenaiva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api nirastā bhavanti /
XXvtrksopu:76_2: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā [Ts_307] api sādhanatvena pratyākhyātā bhavanti /
XXvtrksopu:76_3: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:76_4: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:76_5: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ / amūrtatvāt / karmavad iti sādhyadharmavikalo dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:76_6: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:76_8: amūrtatvād asya / nityaḥ śabdaḥ / amūrtatvāt paramāṇuvad iti / sādhanadharmavikalaḥ / sādhyadharmo 'tra nityatvam asti nityatvāt paramāṇoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:76_13: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:76_16: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
XXvtrksopu:76_18: saṃdigdhobhayadharmā / sādhyadharmasādhanadharmavyāvṛtter rathyāpuruṣe niścetum aśakyatvād anvayo /
XXvtrksopu:76_19: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:76_21: atrānvayo nāsti / na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ [Ts_308] syāt /
XXvtrksopu:76_24: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
XXvtrksopu:76_26: viparītānvayaḥ / yathā yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam /
XXvtrksopu:76_27: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:77_0: 20. tathā vaidharmyeṇāpi / yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ / amūrtatvāt / paramāṇuvad iti sādhyāvyatirekī /
XXvtrksopu:77_3: amūrtatvāt karmaṇaḥ / sādhanam atrāvyāvṛttam / ākāśavad iti kṛta ubhayāvyatirekī /
XXvtrksopu:77_9: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam / yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān /
XXvtrksopu:77_10: yathā vardhamānādiḥ / vardhamānāder asarvajñatāyāḥ sādhyadharmasya saṃdigdho ubhayavyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:77_11: saṃdigaha vyatirekaḥ / saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
XXvtrksopu:77_12: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam / ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:77_14: saṃdigdhobhayavyatirekaḥ / yathāvītarāgāḥ kapilādayaḥ / parigrahāgrahayogāt / parigraho jīvitapariṣkārāṇaṃ svīkāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:77_18: yathā ṛṣabhādeḥ / ṛṣabhāder avītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayor vyatirekaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:77_20: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
XXvtrksopu:77_22: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:77_23: apradarśitavyatirekaḥ / yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:77_24: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ tathā /
XXvtrksopu:77_25: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:77_26: na punar upamānamātreṇa / viparītavyatirekaḥ / yathā yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam /
XXvtrksopu:77_27: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
XXvtrksopu:77_28: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati /
XXvtrksopu:78_0: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
XXvtrksopu:78_1: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:78_2: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:79_0: 22. dūṣaṇā nyūnatādyuktiḥ / dūṣyate 'nayeti dūṣaṇā / [Ts_310] ṇyāsaśrantho yuc / ādiśabdenāsiddhaviruddhānaikāntikāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:79_1: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt /
XXvtrksopu:79_2: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:79_5: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:81_0: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
XXvtrksopu:81_1: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
